texto: ISO/IEC 25030, Software Engineering — Software product quality requirements and evaluation (SQuaRE) — Quality requirements, can be consulted in specifying software product quality requirements. NOTE 3 INCOSE Systems Engineering Handbook contains descriptions and elaboration about many of the specialty engineering areas and the associated critical quality characteristics. Name: Specialty Engineering Process View Purpose: The purpose of the Specialty Engineering Process View is to provide objective evidence that the system achieves satisfactory levels of certain critical quality characteristics selected for special attention. Outcomes: a) Product critical quality characteristics are selected
